      33             : /***************************************************************************
      34             :  * EditActionResult is useful to return multiple results of an editor
      35             :  * action handler without out params.
      36             :  * Note that when you return an anonymous instance from a method, you should
      37             :  * use EditActionIgnored(), EditActionHandled() or EditActionCanceled() for
      38             :  * easier to read.  In other words, EditActionResult should be used when
      39             :  * declaring return type of a method, being an argument or defined as a local
      40             :  * variable.
      41             :  */
